TEI.2.document_title: W S Parrott to Stephen F Austin, 03-25-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: W. S. Parrott to Austin, Mexico, March 25, 1833. Asks assistance in arrest of a forger. (Omitted )
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 932

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*W. S. Parrott to Austin, Mexico, March 25, 1833. Asks assistance in arrest of a forger. (Omitted )*/p* */div1*
